mapper.select: select i.ingredient_name, n.stock, n.price, b.regdate, b.buy_status from tb_buy_no n join tb_buy_list b on n.buy_no = b.buy_no join tb_ingredient i on n.ingredient_no = i.ingredient_no where b.member_id = #{buyMemberId}
select * from tb_Ingredient i join tb_ingredient_mall im on i.ingredient_no = im.ingredient_no where i.ing_cd_category = #{column}

select * from tb_ingredient_mall join tb_ingredient using(ingredient_no)
where ingredient_no = #{ingMallNo}
select ingredient_no, stock from tb_shopping_basket where member_id = #{sbMemberId} and ingredient_no = #{sbIngNo}

select sb.*,i.INGREDIENT_NAME, ig.PRICE, ig.MIN_UNIT, i.ENG_PR_CATEGORY, i.ENG_CD_CATEGORY, i.ING_FILENAME from tb_shopping_basket sb join tb_ingredient_mall ig on sb.INGREDIENT_NO = ig.INGREDIENT_NO join tb_ingredient i on sb.INGREDIENT_NO = i.INGREDIENT_NO where sb.member_Id = #{memberId}
select * from tb_ingredient_mall im join tb_ingredient i on im.INGREDIENT_NO = i.INGREDIENT_NO where i.INGREDIENT_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select eng_pr_category from (select eng_pr_category from tb_ingredient where ing_pr_category =#{pr}) group by eng_pr_category
